name: ActiFried Tandoori Salmon with Refreshing Raita
author: T-fal Canada
summary: Tandoori-spiced salmon is Actifried for a light, flaky texture, then served with a refreshing raita featuring red onions, tomato, mint, and chiles.
ingredients: 3 cups plain yoghurt, divided, or to taste
1 teaspoon minced green chilli, or to taste
directions: Trim the salmon into 12 cubes and coat with tandoori spice powder
Blend 1/4 of the yoghurt with the mint, chilli, cumin, salt, and pepper
Remove the seeds and cut into small dice
Peel and finely chop the onion
Cut lengthwise to remove the seeds easily using a small spoon, then dice
Right before serving, cook the salmon in the ActiFry for 5 to 6 minutes, adding seasoning but no fat
During this time, mix the flavoured yoghurt with the remaining yoghurt, diced tomato, cucumber, and onion
Pour the sauce into small glasses or soup plates and top with the salmon
The salmon will be half-cooked after 5 to 6 minutes
If you prefer it more cooked, continue for another 4 to 5 minutes
